quotes.quote: Opinions founded on prejudice are always sustained with the greatest of violence.
quotes.author: Francis Jeffrey

quotes.quote: Violence is the last refuge of the incompetent.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: The only thing that's been a worse flop than the organization of non-violence has been the organization of violence.
quotes.author: Joan Baez

quotes.quote: Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: It is better to be violent, if there is violence in our hearts, than to put on the cloak of nonviolence to cover impotence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Victory attained by violence is tantamount to a defeat, for it is momentary.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There are more pleasant things to do than beat up people.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Perseverance is more prevailing than violence; and many things which cannot be overcome when they are together, yield themselves up when taken little by little.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The right things to do are those that keep our violence in abeyance; the wrong things are those that bring it to the fore.
quotes.author: Robert J. Sawyer

quotes.quote: It is by no means self-evident that human beings are most real when most violently excited; violent physical passions do not in themselves differentiate men from each other, but rather tend to reduce them to the same state.
quotes.author: Thomas Elliot
